name: Serial Solitaire
description:
For this jam I was originally part of a larger group for a really cool project, but unfortunately it didn't work out and the project fell apart. I still wanted to submit something so I crunched out an idea for a solitaire I had. The game design isn't super great and I didn't have enough time to do the art how I wanted, but I'm still really proud of how it turned out with the time that I had. I'm hoping to come back to this project after the jam sometime and polish it up a bit. Thank you so much for playing!

Credit to my friends Julia for helping me with design and Monev for the beautiful forest picture he took.
